outputs.phase_description: Feedback loop with cumulative saturation and dual-band filtering
components_this_phase: juce::dsp::WaveShaper<float> (L + R) - Cumulative saturation with tanh
juce::dsp::IIR::Filter<float> (L + R hi-pass) - Lo-cut filter in feedback loop
juce::dsp::IIR::Filter<float> (L + R lo-pass) - Hi-cut filter in feedback loop
Feedback state variables (L + R) - Stores previous output for feedback mixing
outputs.signal_flow: Input → Stereo Width → Delay (260ms) + Feedback Loop → Master Output → Output
outputs.feedback_chain: Delay Output → Saturation → Hi-Pass Filter → Lo-Pass Filter → Feedback Gain → Mix with Input

implementation_details.saturation_formula: output = tanh(gain * input), where gain = pow(10.0, saturationDB / 20.0)
implementation_details.edge_case_handling: If filterBandLow > filterBandHigh, swap values to ensure valid bandpass
implementation_details.cumulative_effects: Each repeat applies saturation and filtering again (progressive buildup)
